post.title: Female-Focused Fintech Shecluded Appoints Farida Yahya As Vice President
post.excerpt: Shecluded is positioned to support women build and scale businesses that will thrive and leverage financial services to achieve their dream of financial freedom.
post.content:
Shecluded, Africa’s first, female-focused tech-enabled financial wellness company, has appointed Farida Yahya as its Vice President to help support the brand’s goal of expanding its operations and impact in Northern Nigeria.

The company disclosed the appointment of Farida who is a management consultant and business development manager with over 12 years of experience, in a statement in Abuja.

“Over the past six years, Farida has impacted over 1200 women and 500 startups. She does this by provding a sustainable digital learning experience that enables female founders from under served communities to build scalable businesses, fulfill their potential and lead happy lives,” the statement said.

“Aside expanding the reach of the brand that is Shecluded, I find it exciting because I get to make sure that the financial inclusion gap is grossly reduced,” Daily Trust quotes Ms Yahya as saying.  “Also working with other partners already on ground within the north, we get to create an ecosystem that supports financial independence of women in the region.”

The company provides growth loans, financial education and asset-building tools for thousands of female entrepreneurs across Nigeria. With an active network of over 10,000 female entrepreneurs across diverse sectors, Shecluded is positioned to support women build and scale businesses that will thrive and leverage financial services to achieve their dream of financial freedom.

node.title: Rose-Margaret Ekeng-Itua has become the first black woman to hold a PhD in Cybernetics
node.excerpt: An award-winning Nigerian Professor, Rose-Margaret Ekeng-Itua, has emerged as the first black woman in the world to earn a doctorate (PhD) in Cybernetics, which is the scientific study of control and communication in animals and machines, concerned with understanding complex systems like learning, cognition, adaptation, emergence, communication, and efficiency. node.title: Folake Owodunni Wins Global Aurora Tech Award 2024
node.excerpt: Nigerian Folake Owodunni has been named the recipient of the Global Aurora Tech Award 2024. Owodunni’s victory was announced on International Women’s Day.

node.title: Tech Sales vs Business Development
node.excerpt: Tech sales and Business development are important for generating revenue for companies in the tech industry. While both of them play the same role of contributing to the company’s growth, they do it in a different way and timeframe. Tech sales focus on closing deals with different customers, while business development creates new business opportunities […]
